text: Gandia (; ) is a city in the Valencian Community, eastern Spain on the Mediterranean. Gandia is located on the Costa del Azahar, south of Valencia and north of Alicante. ==Notes== ==Other websites== *Town hall of Gandia *Official Tourism of Gandia *Gandia Information Category:Cities in the Valencian Community Category:Municipalities in the Valencian Community
title: Gandia
